A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a mess!  Makes no sense and gives you characters you could care less about.  Destroys the characters you do care about.  Forget about it being a bad Star Wars movie.  It is a bad movie period.  I have no idea what the \"critics\" are thinking.  I spent most of my time looking at the walls and ceiling of the theater.  \n\nI waited in line to see the first in the 70's and have always been a fan but not obsessed with the franchise.  Avoid this one at all cost.
